title: Textile, mid-19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave
dimensions: a. Warp:229cm (90 1/2in.). Weft: 78cm (30 3/4in.). b. Warp:230.5cm (91in.). Weft: 78cm (30 3/4in.) Both selvedges present on both pieces.
description: Grid of scrolls and floral medallions ecnlosing striped so as to simulate warp printing. A large misture of pattern sources. Blue, 2 greens, pink, yellow, orange and brown on white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, mid-19th century.Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave. 1974-57-6-a,b.
